titles.title: I Am Covered Over By The Robes Of Righteousness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I am covered over
With the robe of righteousness
That Jesus gives to me,
I am covered over
With the precious blood of Jesus
And He lives in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Oh what joy it is to know
My heavenly Father loves me so,
He gives to me
My Jesus,
And when He looks at me
He sees not what I used to be
But He sees Jesus.
